original_text: So Judas said that he would do it. Then he waited for the right moment to help them to take hold of Jesus. He wanted to do it when the crowd was not there with Jesus.
korean_text: 유다가 허락하고 예수를 무리가 없을 때에 넘겨 줄 기회를 찾더라

sentences.original_text: So Judas said that he would do it.
Then he waited for the right moment
to help them to take hold of Jesus.
when the crowd was not there with Jesus.
